description:
### Right Triangle Validator

This problem requires determining if a triangle with given side lengths can be a right triangle. To be a right triangle, the square of the longest side (hypotenuse) must be equal to the sum of the squares of the other two sides.

Input: An array of three integers representing the lengths of the sides of the triangle.
Output: Return a boolean indicating whether the triangle could be a right triangle.

Example:

``` rightTriangle([3, 5, 4]) // true ```
